scripts.dev: npm run pack-locally && npm install --no-save ./cs-nodejs-bouncer.tgz && next dev
scripts.start: npm run pack-locally && npm install --no-save ./cs-nodejs-bouncer.tgz && next build && next start
scripts.pack-locally: (cd ../../ && npm run build && npm pack --silent) && mv ../../crowdsec-nodejs-bouncer-*.tgz ./cs-nodejs-bouncer.tgz
